Traditional in your browser 繁体字的浏览器显示:融

Traditional in Unicode standard 繁体字的Unicode标准:U+878D

Older traditional characters 旧繁体字/异体字: 螎

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:融

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+878D

Main pronunciation 主要发音: róng

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to melt.

English senses 英语理解: melt, fuse; blend, harmonize

Usage example 用法举例: 金融 jīn róng (finance)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1395

Shuowen 说文解字: 炊气上出也從鬲蟲省聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 融 flip-variant 螎 from three-footed-pot 鬲 gé and phonetic insect 虫 chóng C499 融<螎> simp 融.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- trail of smoke, like a snake, to melt).

Simplification rule explained :

Variant rule : C499 融<螎>

Variant rule clarification :
融 (smoke, to melt) TW 螎 <smoke, to melt>

螎字的基本解释

螎
róng
古同“融”。

螎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［róng］
［《廣韻》以戎切，平東，以。］
亦作“螎1”。
(1)炊气上出。
(2)大明；大亮。
(3)泛指明亮。
(4)显明，昌盛。
(5)熔化；消溶。
(6)指腹泻。
(7)融合；融会。
(8)和乐；恬适。参见“融融”、“融懿”。
(9)和煦；暖和。
(10)长远；久长。
(11)引申为成长，成熟。
(12)通；通达。
(13)引申为流通。
(14)继续；承接。
(15)通“庸”。
(16)水名。参阅北魏郦道元《水经注·江以南至日南郡二十水》。
(17)传说中火神祝融的简称。
(18)姓。传为火神祝融氏之后。见《通志·氏族四》。

螎字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　螎； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1092第43
【正字通】同融。

螎字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
螎字的起名意思

暂无。

Chi
Basic explanation of words
Chi
róng
The ancient same "fusion".
Chi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［róng］
["Guangyun" to Rongqie, Pingdong, to. ]
Also known as "Ching 1".
(1) The cooking gas comes out.
(2) Daming; Daliang.
(3) Generally refers to bright.
(4) Obvious and prosperous.
(5) Melting; dissolving.
(6) Refers to diarrhea.
(7) Integration; integration.
(8) Harmony; Tian Shi. See "Rongrong", "Rongyi".
(9) Gentle; warm.
(10) Long-term; long-term.
(11) The extension is growth and maturity.
(12) Access; accessibility.
(13) The extension is circulation.
(14) Continue; undertake.
(15) Tong "Yong".
(16) The name of the water. See Li Daoyuan of the Northern Wei Dynasty "Shui Jing Zhu: Twenty Waters from the South of the River to Nichinan County".
(17) The abbreviation for Zhu Rong, the god of fire in the legend.
(18) Last name. After passing to Zhu Rong, the god of fire. See "Tongzhi·Clan IV".
Chi
